api/eDIA.html.title: Namespace eDIA | Edia Testproject documentation
api/eDIA.html.keywords: Namespace eDIA Classes Constants Static definitions ControlPanelManager eParam Parameter package definition to send along with an event. eParam.StringBool EventManager EventManager handles eventlisteners and fire events when triggered. It uses eparam class to be able to send custom packages along with the event. Experiment ExperimentBlock Experiment block container ExperimentConfig Experiment config container ExperimenterPanel Base Panel functionality class FileManager Static class to handle file IO Helpers InputActionHandler Mapping new Input system InputAction to eDIA EventManager InputRemapper LogUtilities MainMenu Main menu can be opened in the app with the action 'Menu' It generates a list of scenes (which are tasks) and the default 'continue' and 'quit' option MainMenu.aScene A scene menuitem container MessagePanelInVR Sample script to show the user a message in VR canvas NetworkComManager Communication manager interface. Translates internal commands into network packages and viseversa NetworkManager Manages network connections, disconnections, auto connect, etc PanelApplicationSettings PanelConfigSelection GUI element that enables the user to choose from a dropdown of found experiment config files PanelExperimentControl PanelHeader PanelLayoutManager PanelMessageBox PanelTaskControl ScreenFader Handles fading the camera view SettingsDeclaration Container to hold main settings of the application SettingsTuple Tuple of strings, this is serializable in the inspector and dictionaries are not SystemSettings Global settings of the application TaskBlock TaskConfig Experiment config container Tooltip Enables a tooltip on the component this is on. TooltipManager TrialSettings Experiment trial settings container TrialStep One step of a trial ValueList List of string values, in a class to make it serializable by JSON XRController XRControllerInputRemapper In order to be flexible for each taskblock, the remapping of a controller key to a method is a separate script XRControllerInputRemapper.ControllerInputRemap XRManager This singleton script travels along the scenes that are loaded as it is DontDestroyOnLoad. Responsible for loading/unloading, user related actions, top level application. Has references to the XR rig camera and hands for the rest of the application. XRrigInitialiser Injects eDIA XRrig prefab in the current loaded scene at Awake and positions the playarea on this gameobjects transform. Enums Constants.Interactor Constants.Languages Constants.TargetHZ ControlPanelManager.ControlPanelModes

index.html.keywords: eDIA Framework documentation DocFX using DocFX Guide for setting up and using the framework Installing eDIA framework Nice effect with a block and color coding .  Assets +  Documentation  Package  ProjectSettings  README.md Limitations of the framework None whatsever But probably a few Something in a textblock inline Documentation/docfx.json { "build": { "globalMetadata": // Edit your documentation website info, see: https://dotnet.github.io/docfx/tutorial/docfx.exe_user_manual.html#322-reserved-metadata { "_appTitle": "Example Unity documentation", "_appFooter": "Example Unity documentation", "_enableSearch": true }, "sitemap": { "baseUrl": "https://normanderwan.github.io/DocFxForUnity" // The URL of your documentation website } } --- uid: Your.Namespace1 summary: Description of the Your.Namespace1 namespace. --- cp README.md Documentation/index.md docfx Documentation/docfx.json --serve

manual/examplePage.html.title: Example manual page | Edia Testproject documentation
manual/examplePage.html.keywords: Example manual page Some title The true miracle is not walking on water or walking in air, but simply walking on this earth.  Thch Nht Hnh Listing 01 Listing 02 Listing 03 Listing 04 Old friends pass away, new friends appear. It is just like the days. An old day passes, a new day arrives. The important thing is to make it meaningful: a meaningful friend  or a meaningful day.  Dalai Lama Some other title Latentia ante, eundem meritorum italic ! Elige in timuit templa ferrea, qui arma ligati stagnum turbant. Fraternaque aeternus, dedisse, naufragus corripiens ranas Amathunta et quod laetior culpa nec semper scorpius fuit vicem corpora ardere. Fallit in artus primordia, fratres in bold , ipsi manu and even more bold . Codeblock example methodSomething(parameter, value) { Test += text.performed; Debug.log("We really need to fill it in this texteditor? #vi #editor #unix #flashbacks); } Json test { "experimenter":"eDIA", "participantID":"Someone", "sessionNumber":0, "participantInfo":[{"type":"string","key":"Age","value":"32"}], "sessionSettings":[ {"type":"strings","key":"personNames","value":"Anton, Bert, Anja"} ], "blockInstructions":[ {"type":"string","key":"1","value":"Watch the cube and press the button"} ], "breakAfter":[2], "trialSequenceKeys":["block_num","direction","color"], "trialSequenceValues":[ {"values":["1","1","1"]}, {"values":["1","-1","3"]}, {"values":["2","-1","2"]}, {"values":["3","1","1"]} ] } Some other blabla title Another block example Quote or whatever something like that in a block with a line in the beginning. and can use a hyperlink like lets link this
